members.member:
Return the dual value corresponding to a vid.
Vector containing dual values. A vid corresponding to a constraint._
Returns the dual value. If the constraint has both upper and lower bounds then there are actually two dual values. In this case the dual for the active bound (if any) will be returned.

minimize cL'*xL + cU'*xU + cF'*xF | subject to bG <= AGL*xL + AGU*xU + AGF*xF <= bG + uH | mG bK <= AKL*xL + AKU*xU + AKF*xF | mK 0 <= xL, 0 <= xU <= uV | ------------------------------------------------------- nL nU nF (sizes)

member.name: M:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Solvers.GeneralModelBlendedFactor.SetBlendedValues(System.Double,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Common.Vector,System.Double,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Common.Vector,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Compute the blended matrix:
a dP_x Ax* x Ax b dD - As dP_s^-1 As* y
member.param: The multiplier for the primal diagonal perturbation
The multiplier for the dual diagonal perturbation.

Whether the entire factor needs to be set, or only the perturbations. This implementation does not use setA, because the blended factor combines A with the perturbations - therefore it is impossible to update the perturbations without looking at A.

member.summary:
Calculate the residue r* = Mx - r using the augmented equations:
M x r a dP A* x_p = r_p A b dD x_d r_d
member.returns: The 2-norm of the residue.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Solvers.HsdGeneralModelSolver
member.summary:
Homogeneous self-dual predictor-corrector LP solver using the general model:
minimize cL'*xL + cU'*xU + cF'*xF | subject to bG <= AGL*xL + AGU*xU + AGF*xF <= bG + uH | mG bI <= AIL*xL + AIU*xU + AIF*xF | mI 0 <= xL, 0 <= xU <= uV | ------------------------------------------------------- nL nU nF (sizes)
member.remarks: Please see the implementation notes for details.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.Symbol
member.summary: Symbol is the class for a symbolic variable and is also the base type for all more specialized symbols. Each has the characteristics: Name and Scope, ParseInfo - precedence and infix operator information, Attributes - a set of attributes, Rules - a list of rules like F[x_,y_], and Id - a unique integer useful for debugging.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SimplexSolverSymbol
member.summary:
Symbol for the Simplex solver. A simplex solver can be created from an MPS file, a model or another simplex solver.
Arguments: A series of MPS symobl, Model symbol or SimplexSolver symbol. If options are used, the symbols are put in a list as the first element. Further elements are options.
Returns a SimplexSolver symbol.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SimplexSolverSymbol.MergeMps(Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SimplexSolverWrapper,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.Invocation,System.Func{System.Object,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.Expression})
member.summary: Merges an MPS file into a simplex solver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SimplexSolverSymbol.MergeLinearModels(Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.RewriteSystem,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Services.ILinearModel,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Services.ILinearModel,System.Func{System.Object,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.Expression})
member.summary: Merges two linear models. The keys for source rows and source variables are sent to the mapper which transforms them into destination keys. If a destination key already exists, we log a warning and continue merging the models. The goals are merged in order (first goal with first goal and so on down the list of rows).

member.name: M:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SimplexSolverSymbol.CopyRow(Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.RewriteSystem,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Services.ILinearModel,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Services.ILinearModel,System.Object,System.Func{System.Object,Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.Expression})
member.summary: Copies a row from the source model into the destination models. The row to copy is identified by its key.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.MpsSymbol
member.summary: Symbol for MPS files.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SsGetKeysSymbol
member.summary: Gets the variable/row/goal keys. Arguments are: a simplex solver. The result is a sequence of keys.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SsGetValuesSymbol
member.summary: Gets the values/bounds of the variables/rows. Arguments are: a simplex solver, and optional keys. If no keys are specified, the values of all variables/rows are returned. Otherwise only the values of the specified variables/rows are returned. If a key is invalid, the expression is not reduced. The result is a list of rules with first argument the key and second argument the value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SsSetValuesSymbol
member.summary: Sets the value/bounds of variables. Arguments are: a simplex solver, a series of rules mapping keys to values/bounds. If a variable key is not correct, the entry is not reduced.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.GetCoefsSymbol
member.summary: Sets the coefficient of a variable in a row. Arguments are: a simplex solver, followed by any number of rules: { row, var } -> coef.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SolverFoundation.Rewrite.SetCoefsSymbol
member.summary: Sets the coefficient of a variable in a row. Arguments are: a simplex solver, followed by any number of rules: { row, var } -> coef.

member.param: delegate with takes ValueTable, address as string(for the excel table/range) and array of keys which is used for table binding
